keyword: how many calories in a wendys frosty
title: How Many Calories in a Wendy's Frosty?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a Wendy's Frosty (medium chocolate size), plus full nutrition breakdown including carbs, protein, fat, and serving tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in a Wendy's Frosty?
assumptions: Medium chocolate Frosty (16 oz serving); based on Wendy's official nutrition data; no toppings added.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, flavor, location, and customizations. Check Wendy's app or menu for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A medium Wendy's Chocolate Frosty contains about 470 calories and 12 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a small Wendy's Frosty?
faqs.a: A small (12 oz) chocolate Frosty has about 340 calories.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Wendy's Frosty?
faqs.a: A medium chocolate Frosty contains 66 g carbs, mostly from sugars.

faqs.q: Is a Wendy's Frosty high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, with 59 g sugars per medium servingâ€”nearly 12 teaspoons.

faqs.q: How much protein in a Wendy's Frosty?
faqs.a: About 12 g protein per medium chocolate Frosty from the milk base.

faqs.q: Calories in a large Wendy's Frosty?
faqs.a: A large (20 oz) chocolate Frosty has around 590 calories.
